summary: The document is a certification report from the U.S. House of Representatives for the Select Committee on Assassinations, detailing payroll information for the accounting period from 10/01/78 to 10/31/78. It includes salaries, positions, and social security numbers of employees, along with remarks on payroll changes and terminations.
key_findings: The document lists salaries for various positions within the Select Committee on Assassinations, ranging from clerical to professional and investigative roles.
Salary limits for the period were set at a minimum of $1,200.00 and a maximum of $47,500.00.
Notable positions include Staff Counsel, Senior Counsel, Staff Investigator, and Chief Counsel and Director, among others.
The document notes payroll changes and terminations for certain employees during the accounting period.
A total of 86 employees were active during the month, with payroll expenditures totaling $163,277.80.
